name: Operation SOL-3
description:
Aliens have arrived on planet Earth, and they're out for blood. Humanity is doomed for total annihilation, unless you can stand against them and fight.
You must stop them at all costs.

This game was made in 72 hours during the Ludum Dare game jam, based around the theme "Keep it Alive". My interpretation of the theme ended up a little weak since I was having troubles deciding on an idea, but what I am proud of is the gameplay!

It was my first attempt at making a real first-person shooter, so let me know what you think! I definitely had fun making this game, no matter how chaotic it was getting everything done in time.

Programming, Music, SFX & Design by Criobite
Many 3D Assets used are from the Unity Asset Store
